title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 15 July 2009 - XWiki
content:
rrodriguez - (15/07/2009 00:11): sdumitriu: ping  
rrodriguez - (15/07/2009 00:11): concerning the coding issue: it was only a misconfiguration in xwiki.cfg  
rrodriguez - (15/07/2009 00:12): It simply must read xwiki.encoding=UTF-8  
rrodriguez - (15/07/2009 00:12): As you said... Unfortunately sane admins are almost as rare as flying pigs :-)
